dimensions.label: Creative Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and imagination to generate innovative ideas.
Your FarTwin will methodically analyze and break down creative tasks into precise, step-by-step processes.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will dissect issues into smaller parts, examining each component to identify the root cause.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and experience to navigate complex problems and find creative solutions.

dimensions.label: Interpersonal Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be enthusiastic, approachable, and enjoy being around people.
Your FarTwin will be more introverted, preferring one-on-one interactions or smaller groups.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn by doing, experimenting with new skills and techniques.
Your FarTwin will focus on abstract concepts, studying and analyzing theories to gain a deeper understanding.

dimensions.label: Leadership Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin lead others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be direct, firm, and confident in their decision-making, commanding respect from others.
Your FarTwin will foster a team-oriented environment, encouraging input and participation from all members.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly share their feelings, thoughts, and emotions with others.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with trusted individuals or when necessary.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, being spontaneous and flexible with their schedule.
Your FarTwin will prioritize tasks, creating a detailed plan and sticking to it, even when faced with unexpected delays or interruptions.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on new challenges, embracing uncertainty and potential danger.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the pros and cons of risks, avoiding unnecessary dangers or uncertainties.
